entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,191Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 462

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,906Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 41

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham’s Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It’s a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn’t.

entry.title: Affairs and Letters
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheStars8

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,728Chapters: 28/30Kudos: 735

Summary: Secure in your position in the Kent household you are more than happy in your station in life. Yet, when the Wayne family enters the town, you are entranced by the second eldest son, Mr. Jason Todd. Between keeping your reputation intact as a polite young lady and dabbling into the follies of love, you’re caught in a scandalous affair that threatens the very thing you are trying to protect. Regency AU!

entry.title: Follow The Leader
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,975Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 18

Summary: You were no hero nor vigilante, but you played your own role, assisting those who lived on the streets just like yourself. You would occasionally take on a dirty job of some description, whether that was a drug run, a stint in a brothel, whatever it took to get your hands on money. Then, you’d take your cut, disappear a while, and go around Gotham offering food, water, warm blankets, and other necessities to those who needed them. Children, adults, dirty, clean, old, young, didn’t matter to you. If they needed help, they got it.When some thugs come for revenge for a drug run gone wrong, you are saved by the Red Hood. But, as you are a criminal yourself, you are terrified of what he might do to you. He wants to show you he has no intention to hurt you.

entry.title: The Bloom Knot
entry.summary:
Author: nocteris

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,223Chapters: 4/22Kudos: 44

Summary: Dancing around the curse of soulmates could only get you so far, right up until you feel the tug on your heartstrings— dragging you towards the person you bonded with. A haphazard soul bonding with Damian’s best friend on the night of his birthday was the last thing Jason wanted to do. With no soul marks to be seen, you decided to stay away and forget each other. Slowly, you invaded Jason’s life. You were in the manor, then a student in his class, then in the streets he always hung out at, then invading his mind. Jason was getting rusty, had staying away always been this hard?

entry.title: O, Weaver of Lazarus
entry.summary:
Author: fyodvvr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,902Chapters: 3/35Kudos: 7

Summary: 3 years after making a deal with a broken man you end up rediscovering the field of medicine. While seeking to recover from permanent amnesia you find yourself transferred from a local ER to Gotham's General Hospital - the life you thought you had established crumbles.You see the world in strings, not those of fate, but of souls, shifting and knotting through fragile bodies. As strange dreams bleed into waking hours, shadows of forgotten friends stir, and their faces seem to know you too well. Memory calls from the dark, whispering truths you wished were left buried. Will you remember what was lost or lose yourself to the madness that waits behind it?

entry.title: Baby’s First Creature-Feature
entry.summary:
Author: TheGoldenPath

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,675Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 20

Summary: She’s reading to him, a generator manual that looks well read. The pages are yellow and water stained around her long fingers. His vision lazily trails from the book to his bloodied sheets and back to the stranger. Is he hallucinating a comforting presence to make his reality less burdensome? When had his visions ever been pleasant?A pretty girl to sit by his bedside and comfort him in his death. It reminds him of the soft moments of peace in his childhood that he held onto with a white knuckled grip. It reminds him of the few moments his mother felt like a mother. He tries to reach out and touch her hand, just to see if she’s a fantasy meant to remind him of everything he never fully had only for the pain to jolt up his entire abdomen. That works too. He manages to stifle the pained groan that wants to shoot out from the simple motion.   Lightly inspired by the myth of Circe in the odyssey. (Lightly)
